name: Dream Invaders (SeanCreagh)
description:
A highscore game ensues when a girl's dreams are invaded by fairytales and rubber ducks. -Please play in fullscreen-

A short mini-game made in 7 days for the Brackeys 2022.1 Game Jam, using the More Mountains framework as a starting point. I'm planning to release a YouTube devlog about the process, so please do check that out.

WASD to move

Click to shoot
